comment: The BGC was characterized in Ascochyta fabae (AF1 strain, by knocking the nrPKS out). However, the genomic locus containing this BGC is fragmented in A. fabae. Thus, I used the genome of A. viciae-villosae which contains the homologous, syntenic BGC and produces ascochitine as well. Additional note: there is a genome available for A. fabae 247/15 -another known producer- but genome is unannotated (individual gene entries are provided in publication, though)
